data.subject: 113. 將此後序式postfix轉中序式infix，並詳述步驟。* a b + c * d e + f * + w z + *
data.content:
後序轉中序就是把格式從「運算元、運算元、運算子」轉成「運算元、運算子、運算元」
a b + c * d e + f * + w z + *
(a b +) c *(d e +) f * + (w z +) *
(a + b) c *(d + e) f * + (w + z) *
[(a + b) c *] [(d + e) f *] + (w + z) *
[(a + b) * c] [(d + e) * f] + (w + z) *
{[(a + b) * c] [(d + e) * f] +} (w + z) *
{[(a + b) * c] + [(d + e) * f]} (w + z) *
{[(a + b) * c] + [(d + e) * f]} * (w + z)
